name: UI & Analytics Final Fixes
changes: Feedback UI - Added confirmation message after submission
Feedback UI - Widened text area for better usability
Admin - Added Google Sheet link for viewing submitted feedback
UI - Removed Export & Import Options section from the interface

Modified analytics implementation to avoid CSP violations
Fixed 'Newest First' sorting option that wasn't working properly
Improved error handling in all JavaScript files
